issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
After MAPREDUCE-1888, with a java mapper or reducer, StreamJob doesn't respect stream.map.output/stream.reduce.output when setting a job's output key/value classes, even if these configs are explicitly set by the user.


As MAPREDUCE-1888 is not in branch-1, this change is only needed in hadoop 2.
fields.summary: Streaming input/output types are ignored with java mapper/reducer
